name: Finding Friendzy (blackjlc)
description:
It's almost mid-night. You have to go home but your friends are missing and drunk. Find them or who knows what will happen to them. 

Submitted to Global Game Jam - Theme "Lost and Found"

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Dash - WASD x2

Interact - E
